name: Donuts Smuggler
description:
Sail the sky aboard your flying ship, fight your way to the doughnut supremacy and explore a procedurally generated world along the way!

How To Play: Keyboard and mouse

  • Rotate your ship with <A> and <D>
  • Thrust your ship forward or backward with <W> and <S> (arrow keys also works)
  • Shoot with <Space>
  • Look around by moving your mouse (only works with the default view)
  • Change the game view with <V>

How To Play: XBox Controller on Windows

  • Left joystick to rotate your ship
  • Thrust forward with RT and backward with LT
  • Shoot with the A button
  • Look around with the right Joystick (only works with the default view)
  • Change the view with the Back button (the small one close to Start)

Made in 72h for Mini Jam 56. The theme was "Sky" and the limitation was "your game must fit the theme of 2 randomly selected word: War zone and Doughnut".

The "Jam" files are from the jam, and starting with 1.1 those are the update and improves version. Best played with on the desktop version, please download the game! =)
